data.fullContent: Thom was looking forward to buying a new car for years. When he finally had enough money, he went to the dealership. He wanted to buy the nicest car he could get, but he wasn't sure how much he could afford. The salesman said that he could get a great deal if he bought a car before the end of the month. Thom was also very interested in a hybrid car, so he drove home and did some research. He didn't find much information about hybrid cars but figured that they would be more fuel-efficient. The next morning he went back to the dealership and got one, one of only three left in stock.

q1.translation: 汤姆多年来一直想买辆新车。当他终于有足够的钱时，他去了经销商。
q1.front: Thom was looking forward to buying a new car for years. When he finally had enough money, he went to the dealership.
q1.content: Thom was ____ forward to buying a ____ car for years. When he finally ____ enough money, he went to the dealership.

q2.translation: 汤姆多年来一直想买辆新车。当他终于有足够的钱时，他去了经销商。他想买一辆他能买到的最好的车，但他不确定他能买得起多少。那个推销员说，如果他在月底前买辆车，他可以得到一个很好的价钱。汤姆对混合动力汽车也很感兴趣，所以他开车回家做了一些研究。他没有找到太多关于混合动力汽车的信息，但他认为混合动力汽车更省油。第二天早上，他回到经销商那里，买了一辆，这是库存仅有的三辆中的一辆。
q2.front: Thom was looking forward to buying a new car for years. When he finally had enough money, he went to the dealership.
q2.middle: He wanted to buy the nicest car he could get, but he wasn't sure how much he could afford.
q2.ending: The salesman said that he could get a great deal if he bought a car before the end of the month. Thom was also very interested in a hybrid car, so he drove home and did some research. He didn't find much information about hybrid cars but figured that they would be more fuel-efficient. The next morning he went back to the dealership and got one, one of only three left in stock.

options.sentence: His wife, Tina, made him promise that they wouldn't get a new car for the next few months.
He knew he would never have the money for one of his own, but he loved looking at them.
He was determined to pass the entrance exam, even though he didn't know much about cars.
He wanted to buy the nicest car he could get, but he wasn't sure how much he could afford.
